entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls beginning in the morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
